pullRequest.title: add Java snippets for creating, listing, and deleting queues
pullRequest.bodyText:
Environment Variables need to be set:

GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT to the project id

commit.message: add Java snippets for creating, listing, and deleting queues

nodes.bodyText: Is there a reason for doing this rather than using the sample project like the create task test does?

commit.message: fix test comments and remove oldout
Change System.getProperty to System.getenv and require LOCATION_ID environment variable as well

nodes.bodyText: Any chance you can be more specific?

nodes.bodyText: Typically, we have a main method that sets these values that users can modify to run this on their own.  Take a look at both our style guide and other smaples

commit.message: add main methods and remove javadoc style comments to adhere with style guide
